Title: Yubisaki Annainin Shirudaku Settai Okawari Sanhaime
Description: ['A much coveted beauty salon popular among young ladies is actually a trap for innocent young women. Guided slowly into perverse activities, they are filmed in secret and blackmailed by the manager and assistant.']
Staff: [['Araki, Hideki', 'Director, Episode Director, Storyboard, Animation Director, Character Design'], ['Shinkai, Kouki', 'Editing'], ['Kurata, Kenichi', 'Background Art, Art Director']]
